name: DartmoorDamn
description:
Team: Aerton Castro, Lucas Almeida, Polliana Silva, Victor Gutemberg.

This is the second game from Millcafé team, made to conclude the Senac Sergipe game development course.

This is a refined version of the game, with some improvements such as cutscenes, better graphics and english language.

In DartmoorDamn you will explore an island to find a hidden treasure protected by monsters and goblins.

Be careful and don't forget to check the drawing.

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Mouse left button - Shoot or attack with the knife

Space - Jump and skip story scene

Left Shift - Run

1 - Grab knife

2 - Grab gun

3 - Grab drawing
